#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
using namespace std;

int main(){
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);

    int w,i,j;
    cin>>w;
    char crap=cin.get();
    while(w--){
        string a,c;
        getline(cin,a);
        c=a;
        //cout<<a<<endl;
        int countalpha=0,countnum=0,b[a.length()];
        //crap=cin.get();
        for(i=0;i<a.length();i++)
            b[i]=0;
        for(i=0;i<a.length();i++){
            if(a[i]>=48&&a[i]<=57){
                b[i]++;
                countnum++;
            }
            else countalpha++;
        }
        sort(a.begin(),a.end());
        //cout<<a<<endl;
        int j=0,k=0;
        for(i=0;i<a.length();i++){
            if(b[i]==1){
                c[i]=a[k];
                k++;
                //j++;
            }
            else{
                c[i]=a[countnum+j];
                j++;
            }
        }
        cout<<c<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
